tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Loads of thankyou to Dr Aishwarya for treating my wife Laxmi. here treatment and advise gave us huge support. medicine referred by her was awesome as my wife weight was less earlier, and eating habits was not up to accepted. after her treatment and medication  my wife weight and my fetus weight is  normal now. unfortunately I have to move to my home town, as my mother has cancelled her trip to bengaluru due to covid spread in city, and advice us to come home for delivery. Me and my wife will miss Dr Aishwarya treatment, Thank You mam for all your support. Laxmi & Sachin
reply_text: Thanks Sachin have safe delivery all the best for ur new journey thanks for appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
I was trying to conceive for 4years, and was treated by many doctors, at last I came to cloudnine Malleshwaram and met Dr Aishwarya who treated me and then I was finally pregnant with Ivf baby and delivered baby boy recently on Jan 2022
Dr Aishwarya has been a big support throughout my pregnancy, she always responded to my texts and helped me clear my doubts. I highly recommend Dr Aishwarya for patients who wants to opt for IVF

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My heartfelt thanks to Dr Aishwarya mam ,the best and the most friendly gynecologist I have ever met in my life. She listens to our problem carefully, explains the best solutions in very detailed and simple manner. Treats with special individual interest rather than just a doctor....she has guided me in crucial time of my life and i delivered my baby and she is the reason for our happiness....
I would suggest Dr Aishwarya mam for everyone *** ** ******* *** **** ************ ** *************
reply_text: Thank u vidya itâ€™s my pleasure dear happy motherhood dear

review: Our heartful thanks to Dr. Aishwary V Mathikatti who treated us from post pregnancy until the delivery of baby boy for us and fulfilled our dream of parenthood. Her excellence way of treating in a friendly manner and also descision making in a appropriate time was amazing. Her timeliness and commitment towards treatment was excellent. Again thanks a lot Madam for fulfilled our dream of parenthood and making us happy in our life.
reply_text: U are welcome and all the best for ur new journey
